actions.name: AssociateFileGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a File Gateway instance with an Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file system

actions.name: AssociateFileSystemAliases
actions.description: Grants permission to associate DNS aliases with an Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file system

actions.name: CancelDataRepositoryTask
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a data repository task

actions.name: CopyBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to copy a backup

actions.name: CreateBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new backup of an Amazon FSx file system or an Amazon FSx volume

actions.name: CreateDataRepositoryAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new data respository association for an Amazon FSx for Lustre file system

actions.name: CreateDataRepositoryTask
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new data respository task for an Amazon FSx for Lustre file system

actions.name: CreateFileSystem
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new, empty, Amazon FSx file system

actions.name: CreateFileSystemFromBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon FSx file system from an existing backup

actions.name: CreateSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new snapshot on a volume

actions.name: CreateStorageVirtualMachine
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new storage virtual machine in an Amazon FSx for Ontap file system

actions.name: CreateVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new volume

actions.name: CreateVolumeFromBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new volume from backup

actions.name: DeleteBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a backup, deleting its contents. After deletion, the backup no longer exists, and its data is no longer available

actions.name: DeleteDataRepositoryAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a data repository association

actions.name: DeleteFileSystem
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a file system, deleting its contents and any existing automatic backups of the file system

actions.name: DeleteSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a snapshot on a volume

actions.name: DeleteStorageVirtualMachine
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a storage virtual machine, deleting its contents

actions.name: DeleteVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a volume, deleting its contents and any existing automatic backups of the volume

actions.name: DescribeAssociatedFileGateways
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the File Gateway instances associated with an Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file system

actions.name: DescribeBackups
actions.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all backups owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

actions.name: DescribeDataRepositoryAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all data repository associations owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

actions.name: DescribeDataRepositoryTasks
actions.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all data repository tasks owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

actions.name: DescribeFileSystemAliases
actions.description: Grants permission to return the description of all DNS aliases owned by your Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file system

actions.name: DescribeFileSystems
actions.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all file systems owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

actions.name: DescribeSnapshots
actions.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all snapshots owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint you're calling

actions.name: DescribeStorageVirtualMachines
actions.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all storage virtual machines owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

actions.name: DescribeVolumes
actions.description: Grants permission to return the descriptions of all volumes owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

actions.name: DisassociateFileGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a File Gateway instance from an Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file system

actions.name: DisassociateFileSystemAliases
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate file system aliases with an Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file system

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for an Amazon FSx resource

actions.name: ManageBackupPrincipalAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to manage backup principal associations through AWS Backup

actions.name: ReleaseFileSystemNfsV3Locks
actions.description: Grants permission to release file system NFS V3 locks

actions.name: RestoreVolumeFromSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to restore volume state from a snapshot

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag an Amazon FSx resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from an Amazon FSx resource

actions.name: UpdateDataRepositoryAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to update data repository association configuration

actions.name: UpdateFileSystem
actions.description: Grants permission to update file system configuration

actions.name: UpdateSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to update snapshot configuration

actions.name: UpdateStorageVirtualMachine
actions.description: Grants permission to update storage virtual machine configuration

actions.name: UpdateVolume
actions.description: Grants permission to update volume configuration
